post.desc:
Koishi, no! This fight is over! Yes, I know she sliced your ear off, 'cause I have it right her- This is the bell, Kokoro! So shut the f#ck and go pick up your molar over there!

Alright. Now, listen here. This fight never happened. And we are going to get all this fixed up at Eien- If you girls don't stop right this instant, I will seriously drag both of you to **Hijiri** instead. You do know she's meeting with **Enma**-sama today too, right?
